titles.title: Remote Monitoring Access Act of 2006
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of remote patient management services under part B of the Medicare Program.
Remote Monitoring Access Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Remote Monitoring Access Act of 2006 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of remote patient management services for chronic health care conditions.
